title: Can't Get Enough
description: Renowned for his fighting prowess, Ailean the Wicked has a new conquest in mind—the gorgeous dragoness Shalin the Innocent. While he’s saving her from her enemies, he plans to prove that even in human form a bad-boy dragon can show a girl a good time that’s truly off the scale . . .Originally published in Everlasting Bad Boys. (Also previously published in What A Dragon Should Know SUPER Edition [15Aug2010] as an extra.)
author: G.A. Aiken
